Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-1861 affecting package php for versions less than 8.1.32-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-1861 affecting package php for versions less than 8.1.32-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package php is earlier than 8.1.32-1, affected by CVE-2025-1861
